sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Container, Accordion } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./ProgramMaster.css"; // Assuming this CSS file exists for general styling const ProgramMaster: React.FC = () => { const [activePlan, setActivePlan] = useState("plan1_1"); // State to manage active plan for the table // Data for Program Overview const programOverview = { title: "Master of Science Program in Polymer Science and Technology", description: "The Master of Science Program in Polymer Science and Technology (International Program / Revised Program in 2024) is offered by the Faculty of Science and Faculty of Graduate Studies at Mahidol University. This program requires not less than 36 credits.", programStructure: { plan1_1: { name: "Plan 1.1 Academic (Research only)", details: "This plan focuses entirely on research, with a total of 36 credits dedicated to thesis work.", credits: "36 credits (Thesis)", }, plan1_2: { name: "Plan 1.2 Academic (Coursework and research)", details: "This plan combines coursework and research, requiring 14 credits of required courses, not less than 10 credits of elective courses, and 12 credits for the thesis, totaling not less than 36 credits.", credits: "14 credits (Required) + ≥10 credits (Elective) + 12 credits (Thesis)", }, }, admissionRequirements: { plan1_1: { title: "Plan 1.1 Academic (Research only)", requirements: [ "Obtained B.Sc. in polymer science and technology, chemistry, industrial chemistry, physics, material science, or related fields.", "Obtained a minimum GPA of 3.50, or a minimum GPA of 3.00 with at least two years of working experience in polymers or related fields.", "Other requirements are to follow the rules and regulations of the Faculty of Graduate Studies.", "Applicants whose credentials differ from qualifications above may be able to apply to the program if the Program Administrative Committee and the Dean of the Faculty of Graduate Studies grant the permission.", ], }, plan1_2: { title: "Plan 1.2 Academic (Coursework and research)", requirements: [ "Obtained B.Sc. in polymer science and technology, chemistry, industrial chemistry, physics, material science, or related fields.", "Obtained a minimum GPA of 2.50.", "Other requirements are to follow the rules and regulations of the Faculty of Graduate Studies.", "Applicants whose credentials differ from qualifications above may be able to apply to the program if the Program Administrative Committee and the Dean of the Faculty of Graduate Studies grant the permission.", ], }, }, careerOpportunities: [ "Researchers and developers in the public and private sectors specializing in polymer science and technology.", "Analysts, quality control specialists, and production process managers for polymer materials in both public and private organizations.", "Pursuing freelance careers related to their field of study.", ], }; // Data for Course of Program - Plan 1.1 const plan1_1Courses = [ { year: 1, semester: 1, courseCode: "SCCH 798", courseTitle: "Thesis", credits: "9 (0-27-0)", activities: "Conduct a literature review and develop a research proposal; Proposal examination", }, { year: 1, semester: 2, courseCode: "SCCH 798", courseTitle: "Thesis", credits: "9 (0-27-0)", activities: "Begin experimental work and data collection; Analyze data and draw preliminary conclusions", }, { year: 2, semester: 1, courseCode: "SCCH 798", courseTitle: "Thesis", credits: "9 (0-27-0)", activities: "Continue experimental work (if necessary); Write a thesis and seek feedback", }, { year: 2, semester: 2, courseCode: "SCCH 798", courseTitle: "Thesis", credits: "9 (0-27-0)", activities: "Finalize thesis and prepare for defense; Defend thesis and complete graduation requirements", }, ]; // Data for Course of Program - Plan 1.2 const plan1_2Courses = [ { year: 1, semester: 1, courseCode: "SCCH 523", courseTitle: "Polymer Chemistry", credits: "2(2-0-4)", activities: "", }, { year: 1, semester: 1, courseCode: "SCCH 543", courseTitle: "Polymer Physics", credits: "2(2-0-4)", activities: "", }, { year: 1, semester: 1, courseCode: "SCCH 596", courseTitle: "Polymer Rheology and Processing", credits: "2(2-0-4)", activities: "", }, { year: 1, semester: 1, courseCode: "SCCH 636", courseTitle: "Essential Skills for Research and Work", credits: "2(2-0-4)", activities: "", }, { year: 1, semester: 1, courseCode: "SCCH 525", courseTitle: "Polymer Characterisation and Techniques in Polymer Science", credits: "3(2-3-4)", activities: "", }, { year: 1, semester: 1, courseCode: "SCCH 528", courseTitle: "Experimental Design and Analysis", credits: "2(2-0-4)", activities: "", }, { year: 1, semester: 2, courseCode: "SCCH 588", courseTitle: "Polymer Seminar I", credits: "1(1-0-2)", activities: "", }, { year: 1, semester: 2, courseCode: "Elective course", courseTitle: "Not less than 10 cr.", credits: "", activities: "", }, { year: 2, semester: 1, courseCode: "SCCH 698", courseTitle: "Thesis", credits: "6(0-18-0)", activities: "Conduct a literature review and develop a research proposal; Proposal examination; Begin experimental work and data collection", }, { year: 2, semester: 2, courseCode: "SCCH 698", courseTitle: "Thesis", credits: "6(0-18-0)", activities: "Analyze data and draw conclusions; Continue experimental work (if necessary); Write a thesis and seek feedback; Finalize thesis and prepare for defense; Defend thesis and complete graduation requirements", }, ]; // Elective courses data (for display if needed, not directly in the main table for Plan 1.2) const electiveCourses = [ { code: "SCCH 526", title: "Polymer Modification", credits: "2(2-0-4)" }, { code: "SCCH 527", title: "Polymer Colloids", credits: "2(2-0-4)" }, { code: "SCCH 597", title: "Advanced Polymer Processing", credits: "2(2-0-4)", }, { code: "SCCH 550", title: "Rubber Science and Technology", credits: "2(2-0-4)", }, { code: "SCCH 598", title: "Nanomaterials", credits: "2(2-0-4)" }, { code: "SCCH 635", title: "Polymer Blends and Composites", credits: "2(2-0-4)", }, { code: "SCCH 637", title: "Science and Technology of Natural Rubber Latex", credits: "2(2-0-4)", }, { code: "SCCH 530", title: "Biopolymers for a Sustainable World", credits: "2(2-0-4)", }, { code: "SCCH 531", title: "Sustainable Plastic Technology", credits: "2(2-0-4)", }, ]; return (
{/* Program Header */}

{programOverview.title}

{programOverview.description}

{/* Program Content - Accordion */}

Program Overview

{/* Program Structure */} Program Structure

The curriculum complies with the Announcement of The Commission on Higher Education Standard on the subject of Criteria and Standards of Graduate Studies Program B. E. 2565, Master Degree, and offers two plans:

  • {programOverview.programStructure.plan1_1.name}: {" "} {programOverview.programStructure.plan1_1.details} ( {programOverview.programStructure.plan1_1.credits})
  • {programOverview.programStructure.plan1_2.name}: {" "} {programOverview.programStructure.plan1_2.details} ( {programOverview.programStructure.plan1_2.credits})
{/* Admission Requirements */} Admission Requirements

{programOverview.admissionRequirements.plan1_1.title}:

    {programOverview.admissionRequirements.plan1_1.requirements.map( (req, index) => (
  • {req}
    • ) )}

{programOverview.admissionRequirements.plan1_2.title}:

    {programOverview.admissionRequirements.plan1_2.requirements.map( (req, index) => (
  • {req}
    • ) )}
{/* Career Opportunities */} Career Opportunities
    {programOverview.careerOpportunities.map( (opportunity, index) => (
  • {opportunity}
    • ) )}
{/* Course of Program - Dynamic Table */}

Course of Program

{/* Plan Selection Buttons */}
{/* Course Table */}
{activePlan === "plan1_1" ? ( plan1_1Courses.map((course, index) => ( )) ) : ( <> {plan1_2Courses.map((course, index) => ( ))} {/* Display Elective Courses separately for Plan 1.2 if desired, or integrate into the table */} {electiveCourses.map((course, index) => ( ))} )}
Year Semester Course Code Course Title Credits Activities / Notes
{course.year} {course.semester} {course.courseCode} {course.courseTitle} {course.credits} {course.activities}
{course.year} {course.semester} {course.courseCode} {course.courseTitle} {course.credits} {course.activities}
Elective Courses (Not less than 10 credits)
- - {course.code} {course.title} {course.credits}
); }; export default ProgramMaster;
